snippet: New York Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony was ejected for a flagrant foul during the game against the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday as tempers flared again in the National Basketball Association....
lead_paragraph: New York Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony was ejected for a flagrant foul during the game against the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday as tempers flared again in the National Basketball Association.

headline.main: Anthony Ejected for Flagrant Foul as Knicks Fall to Hawks
headline.print_headline: Anthony Ejected for Flagrant Foul as Knicks Fall to Hawks
